question: Which university is located in Tromsø, Norway?
true_answer: UiT Norges arktiske universitet (UiT The Arctic University of Norway).
asked_question_translated: Ktorá univerzita sa nachádza v nórskom meste Tromsø?
answer: V nórskom meste Tromsø sa nachádza Univerzita v Tromsø – Nórska arktická univerzita (UiT).
answer_translated_eng: The University of Tromsø in Tromsø, Norway, is home to the University of the Arctic Norway (UiT).
